overview:
Steve Grady is co-founder, president and COO for RoyaltyShare. Grady is a veteran of the digital music space having spent the past seven years working in a variety of executive marketing and management positions at eMusic. From 2001 to 2005, Grady served as general manager of the download service. Prior to that Grady was executive vice president of Marketing.

Before his tenure in the digital music business, Grady spent 10 years in marketing and communications roles in the Internet and PC Software industries. His background includes positions with Infoseek, Borland Software, Ashton-Tate, Teradata Corporation and Lotus Development.
